home.title: National Organization for Corruption Prevention and Public Property Protection
home.subtitle: A private institution, approved by notarial deed No. 2024/1309, working to promote integrity values, protect public funds, and combat corruption in all its forms, in accordance with Algerian laws and in coordination with competent authorities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To establish a culture of transparency and integrity in society, protect public property, and enhance the citizen's role in preventing corruption.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: An Algeria free from corruption, based on justice and good governance, defending the public interest.

reporting.title: Receiving Reports
reporting.description: Receiving reports and complaints related to corruption cases.

legal.title: Legal Guidance
legal.description: Providing legal guidance in the field of public property protection.

training.title: Training Sessions
training.description: Organizing training sessions on integrity and governance.

awareness.title: Awareness Raising
awareness.description: Raising awareness through campaigns, forums, and seminars.

reports.title: Periodic Reports
reports.description: Preparing periodic reports on local corruption.

cooperation.title: Institutional Cooperation
cooperation.description: Cooperation with official bodies in handling cases.

welcome.title: Welcome
